(7:52) 16-V.Testaverde pass to 85-J.Robinson for 1 yard, TOUCHDOWN. Fake handoff middle; pass caught right corner of the end zone; 3 career catches all for touchdowns by Robinson.
3-B.Cundiff extra point is GOOD, Center-85-J.Robinson, Holder-9-T.Romo.
